Battle.AutoStop: Press anything to stop Auto Battle.
Battle.AutoHelp: Sets party to Auto Battle mode.
Battle.SkillHelp: Opens a list of skills under the \C[16]%1\C[0] category.
Battle.ItemHelp: Opens a list of items that you can use.
Battle.AutoHelp2: Automatically choose an action suitable for combat.
State.Debuff.Physical.Desc: Reduces Defence and Magical Defence by 5%.
State.Debuff.Earth.Desc: Reduces Evasion and Magical Evasion by 15%.
State.Debuff.Wind.Desc: Reduces Accuracy and Crit Chance by 15%.
State.Debuff.Star.Desc: Increases all non-DoT damage taken by 10%.
State.Debuff.Void.Desc: Reduces Attack and Magical Attack by 5%.
State.DoT.Physical.Desc: Deals Physical damage every turn, reduces Defence and Magical Defence by 7.5%.
State.DoT.Fire.Desc: Deals Fire damage every turn, reduces maximum HP by 10%.
State.DoT.Ice.Desc: Deals Ice damage every turn, and reduces Agility by 10%.
State.DoT.Electricity.Desc: Deals Electrical damage every turn, and increases DoT taken by 5%.
State.DoT.Water.Desc: Deals Water damage every turn, and reduces Luck by 15%.
State.DoT.Earth.Desc: Deals Earth damage every turn (ignoring 50% of Defence), and reduces Evasion by 5%.
State.DoT.Wind.Desc: Deals Wind damage every turn (ignoring 50% of Magical Defence), and reduces Accuracy by 5%.
State.DoT.Star.Desc: Deals Star damage every turn, and increases damage taken by 15%.
State.DoT.Void.Desc: Deals Void damage every turn, alongside reducing Attack and Magical Attack by 7.5%.
State.DoT.Nature.Desc: Deals Natural damage every turn, an decreases damage dealt by 15%.
State.DoT.Elementless.Desc: Deals 0.5% of Max HP as damage every turn.
State.CC.Physical.Desc: Reduces Defence and Magical Defence by 10% and prevents from taking action. Strongly Delays upon being applied.
State.CC.Fire.Desc: Deals Fire damage every turn, reduces Max HP by 20%, and prevents from taking action. Turns into Singed upon expire.
State.CC.Ice.Desc: Increases damage taken by 50%, reduces Agility by 20%, and prevents from taking action. Breaks upon being attacked, and turns into Frost upon expire.
State.CC.Electricity.Desc: Increases DoT damage taken by 25% and prevents from taking action.
State.CC.Water.Desc: Reduces Luck by 25% and prevents from taking action.
State.CC.Earth.Desc: Prevents from taking action. Has a chance of being prolonged every turn.
State.CC.Wind.Desc: Prevents from taking action and has a chance of Insta-Killing every turn.
State.CC.Star.Desc: Deals Star damage every turn and prevents from taking action. Turns into Weakness upon expire.
State.CC.Void.Desc: Reduces Agility by 90%, increases all damage taken by 10%, and prevents from taking action.
State.CC.Nature.Desc: Deals Natural damage every turn and prevents from taking action. Turns into Poison upon expire.
State.CC.Elementless.Desc: Increases HP Regeneration by 2.5%, but prevents from taking action.
State.Talent.Ember1.Desc: Ember's current Body Temperature is \V[6]° out of 120°.
State.Cooldown.AreaOverheat.Desc: Area Overheat is currently on cooldown.
Skill.Hana.ShurikenThrow.1.Desc: Throws a shuriken at an enemy, dealing 150% Material Weapon-elemental damage to a single enemy.
Skill.Hana.ShurikenThrow.2.Desc: Throws a shuriken at an enemy, dealing 175% Material Weapon-elemental damage to a single enemy.
Skill.Hana.ShurikenThrow.3.Desc: Throws two shurikens at an enemy, dealing 100% Material Weapon-elemental damage to a single enemy per hit.
Skill.Hana.ShurikenThrow.4.Desc: Throws two shurikens at an enemy, dealing 125% Material Weapon-elemental damage to a single enemy per hit.
Skill.Hana.ShurikenThrow.5.Desc: Throws two shurikens at an enemy, dealing 150% Material Weapon-elemental damage to a single enemy per hit. Ignores 10% of enemy DEF.
Skill.Hana.ShurikenThrow.6.Desc: Throws two shurikens at an enemy, dealing 175% Material Weapon-elemental damage to a single enemy per hit. Ignores 20% of enemy DEF.
Skill.Hana.ShurikenThrow.7.Desc: Throws five shurikens at an enemy, dealing 80% Material Weapon-elemental damage to a single enemy per hit. Ignores 25% of enemy DEF.
Ult.Ember.Desc:
Increases Body temperature by 10°, dealing high Fire damage to all enemies, while also applying Burn, Inferno, and a delay on them.
"Now it's time for you to try how pure inferno feels like!"
